content: serenity is designed to be a peaceful and relaxing knit which is and always will be free just my small way of thanking the knitting community featuring simple stocking stitch garter and a simple yet pretty lace panel serenity is hugely adaptable one skein of special hand dyed fingering/4ply weight yarn makes a wide shallow crescent shawl perfectly sized for draping as a scarf with ideas given in the pattern for changes to include using more yarn or making yours more lacy or using two colours serenity is a pattern you re going to want to knit more than once the pattern includes both written and charted instructions and has been test knit the purple sample shown was knit in meraki studios silkweb in soul to the basic pattern the gradient sample shown was knit in hollyberry designs fingering gradient in beautiful nightmare using the extended lace option in the pattern
